titles.title: A concurrent resolution supporting the goals and ideals of "National Purple Heart Recognition Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Ms. Bordallo moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules. (consideration: CR 7/31/2007 H8925-8927)
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. Con. Res. 27.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote. (text: CR 7/31/2007 H8925-8926)

action.text: Message on House action received in Senate and at desk: House amendment to Senate bill.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 7/30/2007--Passed House amended. Supports the goals and ideals of National Purple Heart Recognition Day. Encourages all people of the United States to learn about the history of the Purple Heart and to honor its recipients.
